Carousel.title1: French Courses in Small Groups in Rennes
Carousel.subtitle1: Do you live in Rennes and want to improve your French quickly while having fun?
Carousel.text1: Join my tailor-made courses, adapted to your level and interests: small class, friendly atmosphere, and meet other expats!
Carousel.subtitle2: Are you planning to settle in the northwest of France?
Carousel.text2: Prepare for your arrival with a local teacher through tailor-made courses focused on your future region and quickly reach a basic level of French!
